INSERT INTO TB_FILE( FILE_NO ,ORIGIN_NAME ,CHANGE_NAME ,FILE_PATH ,UPLOAD_DATE ,REF_NO ) VALUES( SEQ_FILE.NEXTVAL ,? ,? ,? ,SYSDATE ,'M' || SEQ_MNO.CURRVAL )
UPDATE TB_MEMBER SET MEM_PWD = ? WHERE MEM_ID = ? AND MEM_PWD = ?

SELECT MEM_NO ,GRADE ,MEM_ID ,MEM_PWD ,NICKNAME ,MEM_NAME ,EMAIL ,MBTI ,MEM_PHONE ,ENROLL_DATE ,MEM_STATUS ,MEM_VISIT ,TO_CHAR(MEM_BIRTHDAY, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "MEM_BIRTHDAY" ,MEM_POINT FROM TB_MEMBER WHERE MEM_ID = ? AND MEM_STATUS != 'N'
